author: psteitz
msg: * Removed workaround to prevent ConcurrentModificationExceptions generated by PooledConnectionImpl's notifyListeners method.
* Changed PooledConnectionImpl notifyListeners to copy listeners and iterate over the copy instead of directly iterating over failfast Vector iterator.
2) Applied the same fix to CPDSConnectionFactory

author: thorsten

author: jukka
msg: Use the new parse() method signature in TikaCLI and Tika GUI.

author: bpendleton
msg: DERBY-4363: Add simple benchmark for measuring GROUP BY performance.
This change introduces a simple benchmark which can be used to measure
GROUP BY statement performance. As an example of how to run the benchmark:
Over time, I anticipate that we will add other capabilities to this test to
measure other aspects of GROUP BY performance, but the benchmark seems
sufficiently functional at this point to be worth checking in.

author: jukka
msg: TIKA-269: Ease of use -facade for Tika
Use the new facade to simplify some parser tests.
